snippet: Officials are hoping to make Jamestown, N.Y., Lucille Ball’s hometown, a year-round national comedic destination for performers, writers and fans alike.
abstract: Officials are hoping to make upstate New York town of Jamestown, Lucille Ball's hometown, a year-round comedic destination for performers, writers and fans alike in an effort to boost the area's struggling economy.
lead_paragraph: Officials are hoping to make Jamestown, N.Y., Lucille Ball’s hometown, a year-round national comedic destination for performers, writers and fans alike.

headline.seo: In Lucille Ball’s Hometown, Looking for More Than Laughs
headline.main: Seeking Economic Lift, Not Just Laughs, in Tie to Comedy
headline.print_headline: Seeking Economic Lift, Not Just Laughs, in Tie to Comedy
